About the Company: Universal Arts Ltd.is engaged in the business of media such as TV serials, feature films production, trading in film rights, television software, etc. The company is a pioneer in acquiring negative rights (i.e. absolute rights) of films for a period of 99 years. They sell satellite rights to various television channels; and video rights to video companies as well as also offer movies to television channels for onetime single telecast.In film production, the company has evolved a unique minimum guarantee-revenue sharing model for sale of distribution rights.
